forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 51. West wind 2 to 8 mph.

weather_report:
The morning unfolds quietly over Downtown San Francisco, where the sky retains a muted character that reflects the city's ever-changing temperament. As the sun attempts to break through, a soft embrace of clouds hangs lightly above, with the day's high nudging towards a cool 62 degrees. The air carries a gentle west-southwest breeze, whispering hints of the ocean just beyond the horizon, a reminder of the coastal beauty woven into the fabric of this vibrant urban landscape.

While the day is not completely shrouded in dreariness, fog drapes itself lazily across parts of the bay, creating a delicate contrast against the robust silhouettes of skyscrapers that punctuate the skyline. The marine layer, thick in areas, invites a closer look at the intricate interplay of light and texture, suggesting a gentle stroll along the waterfront might yield unexpected serenity. As evening approaches, clouds will deepen, bringing a cooler evening temperature around 51 degrees, perfect for curling up in a warm sweater or light jacket.

Considering the conditions, a mid-afternoon jaunt through Golden Gate Park could offer a delightful escape, allowing one to wander among the budding blossoms of spring, feeling the cool breeze against the skin. Or perhaps an afternoon spent savoring a cozy coffee in one of the city's many inviting cafés would provide the ideal mix of warmth and leisure. Embrace the layers of this day; they are as expressive as the city itself, revealing beauty in the subtle and the serene.
